column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services. music by the piano brothers express sympathy condolences photos betty ellen tolson, 88, formerly of rockville, maryland passed away on june 20, 2015. daughter of the late james lester henderson and velma gibson trusal. survived by four children, sally ann o'brien of germantown, maryland, karen irene carroll of florida, jackie elaine butt of etchison, maryland, lance evan tolson of damascus, maryland, and a stepson, george william tolson of florida. also survived by ten grandchildren, four great-grandchildren, a sister, nancy watkins of pennsylvania, and a brother, robert trusal of nevada. predeceased by a son, matthew alan tolson and a sister, irene miller. a memorial service will be held on friday, june 26, 2015 at clarksburg church of god, 22820 frederick rd., clarksburg, maryland 20871. interment will be private. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. send chocolates. express your condolences by sending a beautiful selection of chocolates, handcrafted in the usa. browse selection. veteran flag cases. we are proud to offer the finest heirloom-quality products to the families of our nation's veterans. browse products. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. add condolence image: susie b / free. digitalphotos. net
